messages.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this?

inspection.title: Vehicle Self-Inspection
inspection.subtitle_desktop: Scan the QR code below with your smartphone to start the inspection
inspection.subtitle_mobile: You're on your smartphone - perfect! Start photographing your windshield damage now.
inspection.qr_instruction: Point your phone's camera at the QR code to automatically open the inspection interface
inspection.start_button: ðŸ“¸ Go Photograph Your Car Right Now
inspection.tap_instruction: Tap the button below to start the guided photo capture process
inspection.step1_mobile_desc: Tap the button above to launch the inspection tool
inspection.step2_mobile_desc: Take photos of your windshield damage following the on-screen instructions
inspection.step3_mobile_desc: AI assessment with repair recommendations and pricing
inspection.step1_desktop_desc: Scan QR code or use SMS/WhatsApp to get the link
inspection.step2_desktop_desc: Follow instructions to capture your windshield damage
inspection.step3_desktop_desc: AI assessment with repair recommendations and pricing
inspection.cant_scan_desc: Send the inspection link directly to your phone
inspection.link_copied_desc: The inspection link has been copied to your clipboard.
inspection.invalid_link_desc: Please request a new inspection link.

inspection_results.analyzing_desc: Our AI is processing your windshield images...
inspection_results.repair_recommendation_text: This damage can be effectively repaired, saving you time and money compared to a full replacement. The repair will restore structural integrity and clarity.
inspection_results.replacement_recommendation_text: Due to the extent and location of the damage, we recommend a full windshield replacement to ensure your safety and comply with regulations.
inspection_results.whats_next_desc: Your options for getting this {{action}} completed
inspection_results.find_partners_desc: View verified repair shops near you
inspection_results.processing_error_desc: Unable to analyze your photos at this time.

customer_confirmation.select_shop_description: Your insurer has pre-selected 3 shops for you
customer_confirmation.confirm_selection_note: Once confirmed, the shop will be notified and will contact you to schedule the repair.
customer_confirmation.approve_cost_description: Please review and approve the repair cost
customer_confirmation.confirm_approval_message: You are about to approve the following cost estimate:
customer_confirmation.confirm_approval_note: Once approved, the repair shop will proceed with the work. You will receive updates on the repair progress.
customer_confirmation.pending_shop_selection: Please select your preferred repair shop
customer_confirmation.pending_cost_approval: Please review and approve the cost estimate
